hints.label: def-backbone-sde
hints.title: The Backbone SDE
hints.content:
1006: :label: def-backbone-sde
1007: 
1008: The **backbone system** is obtained from the full Hybrid SDE ([](#def-hybrid-sde)) by setting all adaptive parameters to zero:
1009: 
1010: $$
1011: \epsilon_F = 0, \quad \nu = 0, \quad \Sigma_{\text{reg}}(x, S) = \sigma I
1012: $$
1013: 
1014: This yields the simplified SDE:
1015: 
1016: $$
1017: \begin{aligned}
1018: dx_i &= v_i \, dt \\
1019: dv_i &= \left[ -\nabla U(x_i) - \gamma v_i \right] dt + \sigma \, dW_i
1020: \end{aligned}
1021: $$
1022: 
1023: The backbone is a **static underdamped Langevin equation** with:
1024: - Globally confining potential $U(x)$
1025: - Constant friction coefficient $\gamma > 0$
1026: - Constant isotropic diffusion $\sigma > 0$

1003: ### 5.1. Definition of the Backbone System
1004: 
1005: :::{prf:definition} The Backbone SDE
1006: :label: def-backbone-sde
1007: 
1008: The **backbone system** is obtained from the full Hybrid SDE ([](#def-hybrid-sde)) by setting all adaptive parameters to zero:
1009: 
1010: $$
1011: \epsilon_F = 0, \quad \nu = 0, \quad \Sigma_{\text{reg}}(x, S) = \sigma I
1012: $$
1013: 
1014: This yields the simplified SDE:
1015: 
1016: $$
1017: \begin{aligned}
1018: dx_i &= v_i \, dt \\
1019: dv_i &= \left[ -\nabla U(x_i) - \gamma v_i \right] dt + \sigma \, dW_i
1020: \end{aligned}
1021: $$
1022: 
1023: The backbone is a **static underdamped Langevin equation** with:
1024: - Globally confining potential $U(x)$
1025: - Constant friction coefficient $\gamma > 0$
1026: - Constant isotropic diffusion $\sigma > 0$

hints.label: thm-backbone-convergence
hints.title: Geometric Ergodicity of the Backbone
hints.content:
1036: :label: thm-backbone-convergence
1037: 
1038: The backbone system, composed with the cloning operator $\Psi_{\text{clone}}$, satisfies a discrete-time Foster-Lyapunov drift condition. There exist constants $\kappa_{\text{backbone}} > 0$ and $C_{\text{backbone}} < \infty$ such that:
1039: 
1040: $$
1041: \mathbb{E}[V_{\text{total}}(S_{k+1}) \mid S_k] \le (1 - \kappa_{\text{backbone}}) V_{\text{total}}(S_k) + C_{\text{backbone}}
1042: $$
1043: 
1044: for all $k \ge 0$, where $V_{\text{total}}$ is the composite Lyapunov function:
1045: 
1046: $$
1047: V_{\text{total}}(S) = \alpha_x V_{\text{Var},x}(S) + \alpha_v V_{\text{Var},v}(S) + \alpha_D V_{\text{Mean},D}(S) + \alpha_R V_{\text{Mean},R}(S)
1048: $$
